benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/tags - Add tags to invoice item

covered: Valid Payload scenarios tested with multiple and single tag additions (TC01-TC03).
Invalid Payload scenarios exercised (malformed JSON, empty body, invalid tag IDs, extra parameters, security-related malformed input) (TC09, TC10, TC11, TC12, TC18, TC24).
Duplicate submission handling and idempotence checks (TC13, TC20).
Large payload handling (very large body, e.g., 10,000 entries) (TC19).
Validation checks including header presence, data formats, and required fields (TC06, TC07, TC16, TC24).
Authorization path covered (401) when token/header is missing or invalid (TC16).
Non-existent resource handling (404) for invoice item not found (TC08, TC15).
Dependency/integration failure scenarios (service down for tag-definition service) (TC21).
State variation and edge cases (partially populated DB, max-tag constraints) (TC22, TC23).
Regression/edge case: previously fixed issue around duplicates (TC20).
gaps: Caching behavior verification (ETag/Cache-Control) is not covered.
403 Forbidden path is not explicitly tested (only 401 covered).
500 Internal Server Error scenarios are not explicitly tested (beyond 503/504).
recommendations: Add dedicated rate-limiting tests to validate throttling behavior under bursty traffic.
Add caching header validation (ETag, Cache-Control) to ensure proper caching behavior.
Add explicit 403 Forbidden tests to cover restricted-access scenarios beyond 401.
Introduce 500 Internal Server Error scenario tests to validate server-side failure handling.
Consider adding a targeted test for response size/pagination if the POST creates a very large number of tags in a single response.
